name: part_011
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Murasaki Shion share a final moment and greeting on stage before Pekora departs.
Murasaki Shion performs 'Asu no Yozora Shoukai-han' with Oozora Subaru, Nakiri Ayame, and Yuzuki Choco.
Murasaki Shion solo MC section where she prepares a summoning ritual for the next guest using a toothbrush.

subtitles.original: 天下統一は、永久不滅！
subtitles.english: Tenka Touitsu is eternal!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、本当に、最後の挨拶をしますよ！
subtitles.english: Then, let's do the truly final greeting!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 我ら！天下統一！
subtitles.english: We! Tenka Touitsu!

subtitles.original: せーの！うしさとーり！
subtitles.english: One-two! Ushisatori!

subtitles.original: シオンちゃん大好きだぞー！
subtitles.english: I love you, Shion-chan!

subtitles.original: ありがとうぺこちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Thank you, Peko-chan!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、まだ多分このあとも卒業ライブがあると思うから、
subtitles.english: Well, I think there's probably more of the graduation live after this,

subtitles.original: 頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: so do your best!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: これ、あとで渡すから。
subtitles.english: I'll give this to you later.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: 読みますあとで。
subtitles.english: I'll read it later.

subtitles.original: ありがとうぺこちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Thank you, Peko-chan!

subtitles.original: じゃあねシオンちゃん！またねー！
subtitles.english: Bye Shion-chan! See you!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: マジかよ。
subtitles.english: Seriously?

subtitles.original: 気分次第です僕は 敵を選んで戦う少年
subtitles.english: I'm a boy who fights by choosing his enemies depending on my mood

subtitles.original: 魁！アスノヨゾラ哨戒班
subtitles.english: Charge! Asu no Yozora Shoukai-han

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：Orangestar
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Comp: Orangestar

subtitles.original: 叶えたい未来も無くて 夢に描かれるのを待ってた
subtitles.english: With no future I wanted to fulfill, I waited to be drawn into a dream

subtitles.original: そのくせ未来は怖くて 明日を嫌って過去に願って
subtitles.english: And yet, I'm afraid of the future, hating tomorrow and wishing on the past

subtitles.original: もうどうしようもなくなって叫ぶんだ 明日よ明日よもう来ないでよってそんな
subtitles.english: I became helpless and screamed, "Tomorrow, tomorrow, don't come anymore," such a

subtitles.original: 僕を置いて 月は沈み陽は昇る
subtitles.english: Leaving me behind, the moon sets and the sun rises

subtitles.original: けどその夜は違ったんだ 君は僕の手を
subtitles.english: But that night was different, you [took] my hand

subtitles.original: 空へ舞う 世界の彼方 闇を照らす魁星
subtitles.english: Dancing to the sky, beyond the world, a pioneer star illuminating the darkness

subtitles.original: 君と僕もさ また明日へ向かっていこう
subtitles.english: Let's head toward tomorrow again together, you and I

subtitles.original: 夢で終わってしまうのならば 昨日を書き換えて
subtitles.english: If it's going to end in a dream, rewrite yesterday

subtitles.original: なんて言わないから また明日も君とこうやって笑わせて
subtitles.english: I won't say that, so let me laugh with you like this again tomorrow

subtitles.original: あれから世界は変わったって 本気で思ったって
subtitles.english: Since then, even if I seriously thought the world had changed

subtitles.original: 期待した世界が鼻突いたって 未来は残酷で
subtitles.english: Even if the world I expected was annoying, the future is cruel

subtitles.original: それでもいつだって きっと見ていた世界は本当に綺麗だった
subtitles.english: Even so, whenever, surely the world I saw was truly beautiful

subtitles.original: 忘れてないさ 思い出せるようにしまってんの
subtitles.english: I haven't forgotten, I've stored it away so I can remember

subtitles.original: 君がいてもいなくとも 飛べるなんて妄想
subtitles.english: Thinking I can fly whether you're here or not is just a delusion

subtitles.original: 独り歩くことさえ僕は
subtitles.english: Even walking alone, I...

subtitles.original: しないも藍色の風に 吐いた幻想
subtitles.english: A fantasy exhaled into the deep blue wind

subtitles.original: 壊してくれって願って もがいたって
subtitles.english: Wishing for it to be destroyed, even if I struggle

subtitles.original: 願ったんなら叶えてしまえよって
subtitles.english: "If you wished for it, fulfill it,"

subtitles.original: 君は言って
subtitles.english: You said

subtitles.original: また明日の夜に 会いに行こうと捠が
subtitles.english: Even if I struggle to go meet you again tomorrow night

subtitles.original: 愚かな君はいないかな それでも今でも僕ら一つだから
subtitles.english: I wonder if the foolish you isn't there... but even now, we are one

subtitles.original: またねと言おう 笑って言おう 未来もずっと君といたいから
subtitles.english: Let's say see you, let's say it with a smile, because I want to be with you forever in the future too

subtitles.original: 叫ぼう 今の日をいつか思い出す 未来の僕ら
subtitles.english: Let's scream, for our future selves who will remember this day

subtitles.original: はーい！ということでね。
subtitles.english: Hi! So.

subtitles.original: いやー、次のゲストなんですが…
subtitles.english: Well, the next guest...

subtitles.original: ちょっとハードルが高そうなんだよねー。
subtitles.english: The hurdle seems a bit high.

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ名高い魔導書には、
subtitles.english: In a very famous magic book,

subtitles.original: 召喚される人が喜ぶものを捧げると成功するって書いてあったんだけど…
subtitles.english: it said that if you offer something that the person being summoned would like, it will be successful...

subtitles.original: やるしかない。
subtitles.english: I have to do it.

subtitles.original: 磨いとこ。
subtitles.english: Let's brush.

subtitles.original: よし！はい！
subtitles.english: Okay! Yes!
